body: I like NTR, but fuck me if the NTR has the male mc watch his girl get fucked right in front of them. I want NTr, but without the MC watch it happen
I've always ignore the rest of the chapters and stop here for mc. He got the love of his life. Full stop. The rest of the story happens in an alternate universe lol
U thought this is vannila but no, this is a ntr series
